error_description: SQL injection vulnerability: direct string concatenation of username parameter into native SQL query without parameterization
NullPointerException risk: userRepository.findByUsername(username).get() without null check before access
NullPointerException risk: addressRepository.findById(addressId).get() without null check before access
Double password hashing vulnerability in updateUserEntityFromUserRequest mapper expression causes incorrect password hashing
Missing security authorization on DELETE endpoint allows unauthorized user deletion
Redundant local BCryptPasswordEncoder instantiation ignores injected Spring-managed encoder bean
Redundant local BCryptPasswordEncoder instantiation ignores injected Spring-managed encoder bean
Incorrect response: toAddressResponse called on unsaved entity before repository.save() returns managed entity with ID
